hackathon-description-text: McHacks is McGill's annual hackathon, happening on Feb. 21-22 in Montreal, QC.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team with the most number of votes after the final expo will win:
We’re giving out at least one $1k grant to the best hack that could become a product people want to use. A key criterion is that the team wants to continue working on the hack post hackathon.
Up to 4 fitbits for to the team that best uses Mailjet's API
Namecheap will be giving 250 dollars of Namecheap credit for the best domain name registered this weekend!
The team with the second most number of votes after the final expo will win:
The team with the third most number of votes after the final expo will win:
A hack chosen by your beloved organizers. Winners will receive a Microchip Development Toolkit each
Something special for you! (a car drawing? A puppy? 10 puppies?)
